mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_ROOM ( chat_room_id, chat_code, profile_id, video_id, video_type, play_time, room_title )values ( #{seq}+1, #{chat_code}, #{profile_id}, null, null, now(), #{room_title} )
mapper.select: select chat_room_id from CHAT_ROOM where CHAT_CODE = #{chat_code}
select * from CHAT_ROOM LEFT OUTER JOIN CHAT_PARTICIPANT On CHAT_PARTICIPANT.PROFILE_ID = #{profile_id} where CHAT_ROOM.CHAT_ROOM_ID = CHAT_PARTICIPANT.CHAT_ROOM_ID
mapper.insert: insert into CHAT( chat_id, content, profile_id, chat_room_id, reg_date ) values( #{seq}, #{content}, #{profile_id}, #{chat_room_id}, now() )
mapper.select: select * from CHAT as a Inner Join USER_PROFILE as b on a.PROFILE_ID = b.PROFILE_ID and a.chat_Room_id = #{chat_room_id}
